author: The Plain Bagel
description:
00:00 - Intro
02:22 - Recap
04:47 - The Latest Tariff Update
05:47 - The CUSMA Exemption
08:04 - Effective Tariff Rates
08:58 - The (Still) Negative Impact of Tariffs
10:34 - Where Canada Goes From Here
12:40 - Conclusion

On Thursday we got the news that Canada would be seeing its tariff rate increase to 35% after failing to reach a new agreement with the US. Today we'll discuss what it means for Canada's economy, and why the tariff rates ACTUALLY being paid are far from this amount.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/c/ThePlainBagel :)

DISCLAIMER:
This channel is for education purposes only and is not affiliated with any financial institution, although Richard does work as an employee for an investment manager. Richard Coffin does not provide recommendations on The Plain Bagel - those looking for investment advice should seek out a registered professional. Richard is not responsible for investment actions taken by viewers
title: No Deal For Canada - Now What?
